fields.name: Floor
fields.description: Floor tile - goes under all tiles so is visible if there are transparent areas

fields.name: Player Down
fields.description: Player facing down - all other directions will default to this if left empty

fields.name: Player Up
fields.description: Player facing up - will default to player down if left empty

fields.name: Player Left
fields.description: Player facing left - will default to player down if left empty

fields.name: Player Right
fields.description: Player facing right - will default to player down if left empty

fields.name: Wall
fields.description: Wall to block areas of the map

fields.name: End/Exit
fields.description: Represents the square where boxes must be pushed to. Will show above all other tiles, use transparent png for best effect.
